readable.title: 2577972703_a22c5f2a87
readable.content: A girl making a sad face standing in front of her tricycle A little girl in a pink shirt about to cry A little girl with mud on her face cries . A young girl with dirt on her face and a red child 's bike is in the background . The girl in a pink top is standing next to a red tricycle looking like she is about to cry .
